EditorData.AnimationTags: [LILI] Short player grabs Tall Daisy's hands and stand up
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player takes Daisy's hand and gets to their feet.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [LILI] *DUP* Same height player grabs Daisy's hands and stand up
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player takes Daisy's hand and gets to their feet.

Text.Value: Your compulsions will doom us all, if you do not work to stop them. I can help.
Your compulsions will doom us all, if you do not work to stop them. I can help.
You will not become a mind flayer. Not while I'm around. I'll protect you.
You will not become a mind flayer. Not while I'm around. I'll protect you.

EditorData.AnimationTags: Extending hand to hold player up from him sitting down.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Daisy stands, and extends a hand to help the player up.

Text.Value: And I'm here to save you again.
And I'm here to save you again.
Take the hand offered to you.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [LILI] Same height player grabs Daisy's hands and stand up
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player takes Daisy's hand and gets to their feet.

Text.Value: Combative - good. You'll need to be.
Combative - good. You'll need to be.
Are you the evil inside my brain? The dark compulsions?
You can change that, but only if you embrace your potential.
You can change that, but only if you embrace your potential.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Cut back to Daisy/Player with skull globe in background.
EditorData.NodeContext: Daisy looks to player on her right

Text.Value: Imagine hacking the grabby paw off.
Who the hells are you?
I will keep it from consuming you. But for the sake of both of us, you must learn to wield it.
I will keep it from consuming you. But for the sake of both of us, you must learn to wield it.

EditorData.stateContext: Player sitting. Daisy kneeling beside them.

Text.Value: Wake now. You'll feel better - I promise.
Wake now. You'll feel better - I promise.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [LILI] Daisy lift up one hand to stop incoming object and another to push player back to waking world. Player floats up and flys backward
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Daisy gestures, floating the player off the ground, then astral pushes them back to the waking world!

|Daisy puts their hand over our heads again. While they speak, the dream world fades away. The player wakes in camp, dazed. The night sky is peaceful - no battle to be seen. |
EditorData.NodeContext: Alt: Wake now. I'll reach out when I can.
EditorData.SFXTags: A big explosion in the globe shield. Daisy sends the player flying backwards through the air, back to the material plane. Fade to white for daisy's last line
EditorData.VFXTags: A big explosion in the globe shield. Daisy sends the player flying backwards through the air, back to the material plane. Fade to white for daisy's last line

Text.Value: Yes, you have. I saved you before.
Yes, you have. I saved you before.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Quick flash of not splatting into the beach during CRA
EditorData.SFXTags: Flashback. Reuse of CRA_Crash beach landing FX
EditorData.VFXTags: white fade transition into flashback falling to the beach. Reuse of CRA_Crash beach landing FX

Text.Value: Back off. I have enough crawling around in my head already.
Independent. Good.
Independent. Good.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [LILI] Player gets up on their own
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player gets up on their own. Daisy retracts their hand with a smile.

Text.Value: I know your voice. I've heard it before.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Quick cut of the Daisy freeing us form the TUT pod at start of game
EditorData.VFXTags: White flash into shot of the pod inside the nautiloid, surrounded by fire

Text.Value: We haven't much time, so listen closely.
We haven't much time, so listen closely.
I have to go. The enemy is closing in. I will be back.
I have to go. The enemy is closing in. I will be back.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [LILI] *DUP* Angelic creature and dark figure fighting
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Kathoom! An arcane explosion! A chunk of crystaline enegy from the globe breaks of in a collision course for the player.

|In the background the dark figures unleash a barrage of lightning at the shield. It seems to break. The lightning splits and strikes some of the angel creatures. The tide of battle is turning. Daisy's attention is pulled away to this while they speak.|
EditorData.NodeContext: Alt: [intense] I have to go. The tide is changing.
EditorData.SFXTags: One of the wisps kills another wisp with a spell attack
EditorData.VFXTags: One of the wisps kills another wisp with a spell attack

Text.Value: Recoil from any help.
*Though the thought crosses your mind, it doesn't hold you, doesn't devour you, as your thoughts too often can.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge starts to look like they're about to trance, but doesn't go any further, they are shocked to shake their head and snap back to reality

Text.Value: Stubborn. A useful quality.
Stubborn. A useful quality.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [LILI] Player back up abit and gets up on their own
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player backs away from Daisy. Daisy retracts their hand with a smile.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [LILI] Tall player grabs Short Daisy's hands and stand up

Text.Value: Don't worry.
Don't worry.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [LILI] Player react to headache while seated
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
The player's tadpole flairs up in another fit.

Daisy lift a palm over the player's forehead, holds it there a moment. A brief glow. The player is now completely well again.

Text.Value: There is great potential within you. It comes from that parasite. Your instinct is to resist the power it gives, but you must accept it, nurture it.
There is great potential within you. It comes from that parasite. Your instinct is to resist the power it gives, but you must accept it, nurture it.

EditorData.AnimationTags: Player lying down, thrashing a little - like having a nightmare
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Night. The player thrashes, feverish, clearly unwell. They're lying in a grassy field in the Astral Prison environment.

In the distance, we hear crackling sounds (lighting) and what could be interpreted as a scream. It's Orpheus screaming.

Text.Value: I came just in time. You are transforming.
I came just in time. You are transforming.

EditorData.AnimationTags: Daisy kneeling. Player sits up quickly in shock
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Whisps of magic waft toward the player's face, calming their tadpole and the pain they feel. Their eyes open to see Daisy - in armour, powerful, angelic, battle-weary, casting some spell on the player's head

Daisy kneels down by our side, left foot forward, lift up a hand and cast healing spell. Player sits up in a start.

They are confused - are they hallucinating? We see their skin showing signs of illithid transformation.
EditorData.NodeContext: Alt: Hold still. You are transforming.
EditorData.VFXTags: Signs of illithid transformation on player's skins

EditorData.AnimationTags: [LILI] Angelic creature and dark figure fighting., Angelic creature strenghtening barrier defending against dark figure., Dark figure casting lignthing spell, trying to break barrier
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Lighting cracks, it's close, the player's attention is pulled to a giant space skull with a globe of crystaline-like energy forming around it--like a bubble freezing in the winter.

A strange zolly move almost drags Daisy and the player's astal island closer to the skull: https://youtu.be/fP6QrESd7Fs

|The background changes. Plants wilt, the sky gets gets darker. We see glimpses of battle in the distance between angelic wisps and dark, armoured figures. The origin of the sounds we heard before become clear. It is lightning being thrown at the angelic creatures. The lightning deflects on them. They are casting a spell that is creating a magical globe around someone. The globe is not fully formed yet.|
EditorData.SFXTags: Reveal of the giant astral skull
EditorData.VFXTags: Reveal of the giant astral skull

Text.Value: Your salvation. And not for the first time. I saved you before.
Your salvation. And not for the first time. I saved you before.
A fight for the fate of Faern. A fight we are losing. For now.
A fight for the fate of Faern. A fight we are losing. For now.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [LILI] Angelic creature struck down by lighting
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Daisy notices the player's growing alarm at the war in the background. 

Cut back over to the skull where angelic beings are locked in motal combat with dark armoured figures. Ideally this is backlt by the sphere forming. Lighting arcs across the opponents in the mid and background, one of the angelic figures steps into the foreground only to be struck down.
EditorData.NodeContext: Daisy and Player both facing the battle in front
EditorData.SFXTags: Fight between the wisps, the shield around the skull up close
EditorData.VFXTags: Fight between the wisps, the shield around the skull up close

EditorData.stateContext: Player lying down. Daisy standing over them.

Text.Value: Get up on your own.

Synopsis: Player wakes up in a dream field and meets Daisy for the first time. In the distance, a battle rages. Daisy gains our trust - they were the one to save us from the nautiloid and to avoid turning into mind flayers we need to do what they say - embrace the power growing inside of us.
